name: Rufi and Frank Bruz 44
description:
A simple 2D platform game where you can jump on enemies, use powerful flying kicks and use weapons like fireballs and bombs.
You can chain together flying kicks by kicking flying enemies or jumping on enemies.

WSAD to move and jump.

F to perform a flying kick.

SPACEBAR to use weapon power ups.

Gamepad support for Windows OS added but not tested.
